name: Realign Migration Prefixes
description: Renames all migration files in the migrations directory to have unique, sequential numeric prefixes, fixing duplicate or out-of-order prefixes.

required.name: migrations_dir
required.description: Absolute path to the migrations directory.

commands.description: Rename migration files to have unique, sequential numeric prefixes.

parameters.command: cd {{migrations_dir}} && ls -v | grep -E '^[0-9]{3}_.*\.sql$' | awk '{printf "mv %s %03d_%s\n", $0, NR, substr($0,5)}' | bash

pre_conditions: Directory exists and contains migration files with numeric prefixes.
post_conditions: All migration files have unique, sequential numeric prefixes.

error_handling.action: Abort if a file with the target name already exists.
